short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Mini, offline, Random Number Generator (RNG) that can be used without leaving your current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RandomGen is a lightweight Random Number Generator (RNG) that is usable anywhere in Chrome. It works without interrupting the current page, requires no permissions, and runs completely offline. Enjoy!
